[terminal commands]

  1. Update Cocoapods (same as original install):  sudo gem install cocoapods
  2. remove the old cocoapods master:  sudo rm -fr ~/.cocoapods/repos/master
  3. Setup cocoapods:  pod setup
  4. Add the Brightcove specs:  pod repo add BCOVSpecs https://github.com/brightcove/BCOVSpecs.git
  5. Now you ready to install pods with: pod install
